title: How to Make Chocolate with Caramel Bread

steps.headline: Put the sugar in a rectangular tray.
Add vanilla essence into the tray and stir.
Heat the sugar till it starts turning brown.
Soak each slice of bread in the milk.
Keep the slices of bread inside the tray (on the melted brown sugar)
Break the eggs and pour it into a bowl
Mix the yolk and the white part completely
Pour the eggs on top of the bread slices
Pour the melted chocolate on the bread slices
When the eggs starts to dry.
steps.description: Remove from the stove and keep it in the oven for 15 minutes.

steps.headline: When it is no longer hot, eat it or serve it!

text: Put the sugar in a rectangular tray.  Add vanilla essence into the tray and stir.  Heat the sugar till it starts turning brown.  Soak each slice of bread in the milk.  Keep the slices of bread inside the tray (on the melted brown sugar)  Break the eggs and pour it into a bowl  Mix the yolk and the white part completely  Pour the eggs on top of the bread slices  Pour the melted chocolate on the bread slices  When the eggs starts to dry. Remove from the stove and keep it in the oven for 15 minutes. Remove from the oven  When it is no longer hot, eat it or serve it!
